cards.text: Cone-Shaped Head
Soft Spots on Head
Spitting up that baby doesn't mind
Not feeding well because very sleepy
Peeling skin
Umbilical cord has pus, foul smell
Black sticky bowel movement
Vaginal discharge
Umbilical cord dries up and falls off
Circumcised penis has some discharge
Listless, weak or changes in behavior
Bluish-green or gray mark
Stool that contains blood or mucus
Serious difficulty breathing
White substance on skin after birth
Tiny white bumps on face
Throws out arms and legs at loud noise
Forceful vomiting
Rash or red spotches on skin
Loose, yellow seedy poop after day 5
Snorts, pants, groans in sleep
Flaking skin on scalp
Patches of deep pink skin
Blue color of lips, tongue, mouth
Purple or blue hands and feet
No bowel movement in 24 hour period
Swelling in genital area
Fewer than 6 wet diapers per day by day 5
Skin or whites of eyes look yellow
You feel something is "off"
Hiccups frequently after feedings
Fever or seems ill
Soft downy hair covering body
Difficulty latching on the breast
Underarm temperature of 99Â° or higher
Some periods of irregular breathing
At the park
In their home
At their workplace
2 hours
Take notes
How was your day
How's work
How's your sex life
Get a detailed medical history
Review the birth plan
Tell me about your vision for this birth
What are your priorities for this birth
What do you do to cope with discomfort when you are sick or injured
What do you think will help you most with pain in labor?
What have you learned about in childbirth classes?
Have you learned pain-coping skills in childbirth classes?
What things from your past do you think will help you most in labor?
What books, websites, app are you enjoying getting info from?
Have you ever been to a birth? Seen a birth?
What has most helped you to prepare for this birth?
How has this pregnancy been so far?
Was this baby planned?
Do you have a history of miscarriage or abortion?
What are your fears or concerns around this birth?
Do you have a history of sexual abuse?
Who  else will be at your birth?
Do you have any special needs I can help you with?
Have you ever stayed in a hospital before?
How do you cope with physical and emotionally painful experieces?
How do you envision me helping you in labor?
What are your preferences from the Pain Management Preference Scale?
How do you like to get information to make decisions?
How can I help you when you are making decisions in labor?
Let's go over how, when and why you should contact me now, in labor and after
Let me tell you about my back up doula
Do you want pictures of your labor or birth?
Do you want to labor or birth in water?
What interventions are you comfortable  with and which would you like to avoid?
How do you function without sleep?
How do you handle stress?
Do you know where to park and enter your birth location day/night?
Support person, how would you like to be involved?
Who else will be there? What  aret their roles?
Are there any providers in the practice you are not comfortable with?
What are your plans for feeding your baby?
What kind of help do you have lined up for after the birth?
Where do you want to do most of your laboring?
Do you have any concerns about yuor recovery period?
Do you have any concerns about taking care of a new baby?
Do you like to be touched?  How?
Do you have an idea of what to bring to the birth location
How much time  will you (and partner) be taking off from work?
How did you choose your birth location and HCP?
What do you two fight about most?
How did the two of you meet?
What are the top three priorities for your labor and birth?
What is the most important  thing  y ou would like to avoid?
Have you every had any procedures done on on your cervix?
Have you found a doctor for your baby?
Are there things you need for your baby and are having a diffcult time getting?
Do you have good social support?
Do you have a therapist?
Are you worried about finances?
Do you have any sexually transmitted infections?t
Do you have any food allergies? Does partner?
Difficulty latching on the breast
What do you want to wear in labor? Do you have concerns about modesty?
Is a certain religion important to you? Do you prefer a certain type of clergy
Have you had any breast/chest reduction or augmentation surgery?
Are you exercising during this pregnancy? What are you doing?
